document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre, Linnavuori, Rauno E. & Ostovan, Hadi
document.masterDocTitle: An Annotated Catalog of the Iranian Coreidae, Rhopalidae, and Stenocephalidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha: Coreoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An Annotated Catalog of the Iranian Coreidae, Rhopalidae, and Stenocephalidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha: Coreoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Comments. On
Althaea rosea
( Malvaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
),
Medicago sativa
( Fabaceae ),
Solanum tuberosum
( Solanaceae ),
Triticum
sp. ( Poaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 b
),
Gossypium hirsutum
( Malvaceae ) (
Couilloud 1971
),
Epilobium
sp. ( Onagraceae ), Asteraceae and
Poaceae (
Linnavuori 2004
)
. World distribution and host plants of
L. hyalinus
are reviewed by
Hradil et al . ( 2007 )
.
